hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Transition via BTC Dominance Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC dominance (BTC.D) falls below 52.5% while BTC price holds above its 20-day SMA and the Crypto Fear & Greed Index rises above 55, a regime transition from NEUTRAL to BULL occurs within 5 trading days, with altcoins (SOL, AVAX) outperforming BTC by at least 8% over the following 10 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Declining BTC dominance in neutral regimes often signals capital rotation into altcoins, especially when combined with improving sentiment. The 52.5% level has historically acted as a pivot for regime transitions. ETH/BTC strength confirms broad altcoin interest beyond just speculative plays.
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 40% of signals fail to produce a >5% altcoin outperformance within 10 days, or BTC.D reversal above 54% occurs in over 60% of cases.
